questions.subject: ComfyUI-Cre8 viciss-Nodes
questions.question: What is the purpose of the Cre8it nodes in ComfyUI workflows?
questions.answer: The Cre8it nodes in ComfyUI workflows facilitate working with Cre8it images and videos.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-Cre8it-Nodes
questions.question: How do Cre8 viciss nodes work within ComfyUI workflows?
questions.answer: Cre8it nodes utilize the stable diffusion model to generate images and videos based on textual prompts.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-Cre8it-Nodes
questions.question: What type of prompts can be used with Cre8it nodes?
questions.answer: Cre8it nodes accept textual prompts that describe the desired visual output.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-Cre8it-Nodes
questions.question: Can Cre8it nodes generate images or videos of specific styles or formats?
questions.answer: Yes, Cre8it nodes support generating images and videos in various styles and formats.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-Cre8it-Nodes
questions.question: How do I integrate Cre8it nodes into my ComfyUI workflow?
questions.answer: Cre8it nodes can be easily integrated into ComfyUI workflows alongside other available nodes.
